post:
Hi all,

To celebrate the New Year, my upstream gives us a great offer. Buy half year of any products and get another half year free.

Here is the offer:

    CPU: 1
    RAM: 768MB
    HDD: 140GB
    Bandwidth: 10Mbps
    IP: 1
    Vmware with Control Panel
    $33.84/year
    Order Now: http://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=127&language=english&currency=2
    Test IP:  115.47.36.1 and 218.241.24.214


Other offers exceed $48/yr which is against LET rule, so I won't post them here.

Please visit http://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?gid=30&currency=2&language=english for more offers.


Support OS:

1. Windows 2003 X86 Chinese Version
2. CentOS 6 X86
3. Centos 5 X86



Before you buy, you should know:

1. Hosted on the E5-2620 node with a lot of RAM, the VPS is oversold heavily, which may perform badly.
2. The bandwidth is not guaranteed.
3. Read our ToS (http://www.starrydns.net/tos) to see prohibited content.
4. VPS activation can take up to 24 hours.
5. Refund can be given in 24 hours after activation.
6. In order to host in China, you need what is called an ICP license. Click here for more details: http://www.starrydns.net/china-icp-license-faq . We can help you get the license (Not Free).



Some tests you may be interested in:
